channel.title: I used the HTML source when world 2 was available...(read more)
channel.description: I used the HTML source when world 2 was available on rs, so when i make a link on a site, it goes to world 2 available...but it brings me to rs

item.title: I used the HTML source when world 2 was available...(read more)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

browse the source from the world 2 page and you want find this:

<script language='javascript'>try { if (top == self) {top.location.href='http://www.runescape.com/'; } } catch(er) {  } </SCRIPT>

a catch(er) that jagex has created

you should use this (save that code as a .htm page (name doesn’t matter )):

<html>
 <head>
  <title>RuneScape World 2</title>
 </head>
 <body style="margin:0;">
  <iframe src="http://ul8.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/game.ws?lowmem=1&plugin=0" title="RuneScape World 1" width="100%" height="100%" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" margin="0" frameborder=0>
  </iframe>
 </body>
</html>

Read full topic

item.title: I used the HTML source when world 2 was available...(read more)
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

Actually its because RS works off a referer system.

http://world2address.com - checks to see if the previous page was http://worldselect.com
if it wasn’t it redirects to the homepage

item.description:

dude…just stop…that’s because all links you find on RS, will take you to www.runescape.com…you’re not gonna scam anyone…jsut stop…and…why are you posting all this here?
